ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron twists the ends of her staff, the retractable energon blades unsheathing. It s made to be broken! Tavatron says through clenched teeth. She spins

Tavatron twists the ends of her staff, the retractable energon blades 
unsheathing.

"It's made to be broken!" Tavatron says through clenched teeth. She spins 
her staff end around and slices the side of Dinobot's left leg. She kicks at 
the same leg with the heel of her foot, hoping to throw him off balance.

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sat, 15 Apr 2000 16:29:17 PDT
>
>* The shot to the back causes Dinobot to go down to one knee but he springs
>back up and without turning brings his tail up and across Tavatron's hand,
>breaking her staff in two.
>He smiled to himself, he was wondering when she would decide to show
>herself!
>Dinobot turns around, grabs Tavatron around the waist with his arm and 
>bring
>her to him. The move was simple but deadly! He'd done this exact thing with
>many bots before and knew that it didn't take smarts to pull it off. He 
>knew
>electrically what to do next.
>Dinobot began to contract his arm and squeeze hard enough that he knew that
>she would feel the air beginning to escape her lungs! If this battle had
>been for real then he would soon feel the satisfying snap of a broken 
>spine!
>He snarled fiercely!*
>
>" Clever! Very clever! But it is also clever to take a few steps back after
>striking an enemy so they cannot strike back so easily!"
>
>* Dinobot squeezed a little harder, he had nothing against Tavatron for
>striking him, that was the aim of the practice. He just simply wanted to
>show her that he was not so easily defeated!*
>
